President Bush Dick Cheney of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama .`` He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure,'' Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself. Simon Cowell is apparently planning to unveil his US line-up as early as next week, and if he take Cheryl Cole and Dermot with him, it will cause major headaches for ITV. A show source said: ITV is pulling out all the stops to ensure Simon Cowell can do both shows, but he still hasn't agreed anything, which is frustrating. If Cheryl Cole and Dermot also have to travel back and forth it could be tricky. The last thing they want is for any of them to pull out.

'' was not the primary reason given for invading Iraq, and even as a retroactive justification it remains weak.
